doc:
Michael Zaslow https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Zaslow 0 Michael Joel Zaslow (November 1, 1942 – December 6, 1998) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as villain Roger Thorpe on CBS's Guiding Light, a role he played from 1971 to 1980 and again from 1989 to 1997. Michael_Joel_Zaslow ( November_1_,_1942 – December_6_,_1998 ) was an_American_actor . He was_best_known for his_role as villain_Roger_Thorpe on CBS 's_Guiding_Light , a_role he played from 1971 to 1980 and again from 1989 to 1997 .
